label: Stop-Motion
def_question: Is this a stop-motion video where objects are moved frame by frame to create motion?
alt_question: Does the video use frame-by-frame animation techniques?
Is this shot animated by moving objects between still frames?
Does the video create the illusion of movement using manual frame adjustments?
def_prompt: A stop-motion video where objects are moved frame by frame to create motion.
alt_prompt: A shot where stop-motion animation is used for movement.
A scene animated using a frame-by-frame capture technique.
A video where objects shift between frames to simulate movement.
